verses.roman:
'ei deha kailuṅ āmi kṛṣṇe samarpaṇa
tāṅra dhana tāṅra ihā sambhoga-sādhana

synonyms: ei—this; deha—body; kailuṅ—have done; āmi—I; kṛṣṇe—to Lord Kṛṣṇa; samarpaṇa—offering; tāṅra—of Him; dhana—the wealth; tāṅra—of Him; ihā—this; sambhoga-sādhana—brings about the enjoyment.
translation: [The gopīs think:] "I have offered this body to Lord Kṛṣṇa. He is its owner, and it brings Him enjoyment.
